mapper.select: select * from rest where reNo = #{reNo} order by 2
mapper.update: update rest set click = click + 1 where reNo = #{reNo}
mapper.select: select * from rest where re_name like '%' || #{searchName} || '%'

select rest.re_name, min(room.roPrice), rest.rePhone, rest.READDR from rest join room on rest.reNo = room.RENO where room.roprice between #{minPrice} and #{maxPrice} group by rest.re_name, rest.rePhone, rest.READDR
